mapper.delete: update gateway_route set enabled = 0 where route_id = #{routeId}
mapper.select: select id, name, route_id as routeId, uri, predicates, filters, enabled, description, order_num as orderNum, create_time as createTime, modify_time as modifyTime, create_id as createId, modify_id as modifyId from gateway_route where delete_flag = 0 and enabled = 1 order by order_num asc
